casebody.data:
Lisa BRUNO
v.
Reed WHIPPLE et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided March 27, 2019

The plaintiff's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 186 Conn.App. 299, 199 A.3d 604 (2018), is denied.

ROBINSON, C.J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
